医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
新成像工具揭示了大脑在耳蜗敏感性中的作用根据刚刚在《神经科学杂志》上发表的一项研究，大脑可能会通过向内耳中的结构发送信号来帮助耳朵对声音的敏感性，并弥补听力损失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/new-imaging-tool-reveals-the-brains-the-brains-cochlea-sensitivity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/new-imaging-tool-reveals-the-brains-the-brains-role--in-cochlea-sensitivity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95F24472-2233-4FF5-980D-6EC1553D291D Mon, 24 Feb 2025 20:23:06 -0500 New imaging tool reveals the brain's role in cochlea sensitivity
研究发现跨GP实践的前列腺癌检测有所不同一项LargesCale的研究发现，GP实践之间的巨大差异是关于它们是否可能使用血液检查来吸收前列腺癌的差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/study-finds-variations-in-prostate-cancer-detection-actection-across-cancer-gp-practices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/study-finds-variations-inpostate-cancer-detection-actection-across-cancer-gp-practices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AC99BA5A-44444242-9150-339DDDAC6145 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 20:14:57 -0500 Study finds variations in prostate cancer detection across GP practices
褪黑激素补充剂可能有助于减少夜班工人的DNA损害补充褪黑激素可以通过提高人体修复能力来抵消与夜班工作相关的DNA损伤，这表明在线发表在《职业与环境医学》杂志上的小型临床试验的发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/melatonin-supplements-may-help-reduce-dna-dna-dna-dna-damage-ing-night-shift-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/melatonin-supplements-may-help-reduce-dna-dna-dna-dna-damage-in night-shift-shift-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d776b5d2-f60e-4177-A177-A12B-D734B935F350 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 20:10:00 -0500 Melatonin supplements may help reduce DNA damage in night shift workers
妇科条件可能会增加心脏病和中风的风险患有一种或多种常见的妇科疾病，例如子宫内膜异位症或重度或不规则时期，可能与影响大脑血液流动的心脏病的风险和状况的升高有关（脑血管疾病），发现了可用证据的汇总数据分析在线发表在《杂志》中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/gynecological-conditions-may-raise-raise-rise-risk-of-heart-disease-and-and-soesease-and-stroke.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/gynecological-conditions-may-raise-raise-rise-risk-fint-disease-and-disease-and-stroke-stroke-stroke.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2106576-e100-4820-8b16-dcedd9cea155 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 20:06:23 -0500 Gynecological conditions may raise risk of heart disease and stroke
基于纸张的血浆现场卡提供更好的艾滋病毒监测在世界部分地区，前往诊所进行常规血液测试是一项财务和后勤挑战，艾滋病毒患者越来越可以选择在纸的设备中收集和运送一滴血液，以吸收样品并将其存储以进行分析在遥远的实验室中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/paper-base--plasma-spot-card-offers-better-better-better-better-hiv-monitoring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/paper-base-plasma-plasma-spot-card-finders-better-better-better-hiv-monitoring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35515799-E9F9-4E53-97D8-D358-D358CEC9E9B1 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 20:02:04 -0500 Paper-based plasma spot card offers better HIV monitoring
FDA批准的技术为帕金森症状提供个性化治疗从今天开始，帕金森氏病的人将有一个新的治疗选择，这要归功于美国食品药品监督管理局的批准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/fda-apprast-technology-offers-personalized-treatment-for-parkinsone28099s-symptoms.aspxs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/fda-appred-technology-offers-personalized-treatment-treatment-for-parkinsone28099s-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29159266-1042-4F5F-A07A-209057C1B070 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 19:59:45 -0500 FDA-approved technology offers personalized treatment for Parkinson’s symptoms
新的AI工具测量脑衰老速度并预测认知健康USC研究人员称，一种新的人工智能模型可以衡量患者的大脑衰老的速度，并且可能是理解，预防和治疗认知能力下降和痴呆症的有力新工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/new-ai-tool-measures-brain-aging-speed-speed-speed-s-predicts-cognitive-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/new-ai-tool-measures-brain-aging-speed-speed-speed-and-predicts-cognitive-nealth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7De50574-B6BE-486C-BB5A-5B5A-5B644BA555AA6 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 19:56:14 -0500 New AI tool measures brain aging speed and predicts cognitive health
了解服用Z-grugs失眠的风险zzzzz。还记得整夜睡觉吗？最近不是吗？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/understanding-the-risks-of-taking-taking-z-drugs-for-insomnia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/understanding-the-risks-of-taking-z--drugs-for-insomnia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=24b6c476-C484-476-C484-4EF9-BC5B-B9E9018EFAAF Mon, 24 Feb 2025 19:30:05 -0500 Understanding the risks of taking Z-drugs for insomnia
创新的移动应用在高血压管理中显示出积极的结果Ahomka平台是一种创新的移动应用程序，可用于患者到培训的沟通，该应用是通过工程学院与加纳领先的医疗机构之间的合作开发的，它在患者的高风险心脏病发作或中风的患者中取得了积极的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/innovative-mobile-app-shows-shows-posisity-results-in-hypertension-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/innovative-mobile-app-shows-shows-shows-posisity-results-in-hypertension-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2583A36C-C405-48D2-A842-9BDF4BE20261 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 19:27:28 -0500 Innovative mobile app shows positive results in hypertension management
研究表明，疱疹病毒在衰老的大脑中如何促进阿尔茨海默氏病克利夫兰诊所基因组中心的研究人员概述了人类单纯疱疹病毒1（HSV1）的途径可以用来为老龄化大脑的阿尔茨海默氏病做出贡献。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/study-shows-how-horpes-viruses-contribute-to-alzheimers-disease-ingage-ingage-inging-brains.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/study-shows-how-herpes-viruses-contribute-contribute-to-alzheimers-disease-ingage-inging-brins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=983491a7-a34e-40b2-bcba-d8fab1ac241b Mon, 24 Feb 2025 19:21:27 -0500 Study shows how herpes viruses contribute to Alzheimer's disease in aging brains
